Room.Name: Riverdell Way/Waterfront Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Waterfront Way and Riverdell Way.
Room.LongDescription: Waterfront Way heads west from Riverdell Way, which runs north and south. On the east side of the road, you can see the large City Walls which encompass the city. The Dentra Central Archery Range is located on the southwestern corner of the intersection, the entrances to which are located on Waterfront Way.
